body:
hi, i think it's a dup of #1817 could you test with the latest version of master?

thanks

i'd be happy to try.  i used the 5.0 tarball for installation, and i don't see any friendly instructions for how to run owncloud from a git checkout.  do i just checkout the "core" repository? that seems to be missing many of the apps included in the tarball.

if you can give me some pointers, i'll be able to confirm whether this issue is resolved.
ah, sorry.  just found http://owncloud.org/dev/contribute/ -- not sure how i overlooked that.  i'll follow those instructions and report back.

hi @skpy,

sorry for the bugs.
you can always download the nightly build here: http://owncloud.org/releases/owncloud-daily-master.tar.bz2
we will also release a beta 2 tomorrow with this bug most likely fixed.

cheers
frank
does this only happen when you try to enable 3rdparty apps?

the notes app doesn't work because it has an error in the info.xml. i will try to contact the author so that this will be fixed. we will also improve the error output so that users know what went wrong here. 
other 3rdparty apps should work fine.
